item.title: Trader Who Predicted $20,000 Bitcoin High Says Market Has Hit Its “Bottom”
item.dc:creator: Rasmus Pihl
item.description:
The veteran trader Peter Brandt is most well-known as the man who predicted Bitcoin’s all-time high of $20,000. Now, however, Brandt is back in the news. Specifically, he is now saying that Bitcoin’s price has hit the “bottom”. Brandt: “Bitcoin has hit its bottom” This new statement came in a recent market discussion with the … Continue reading Trader Who Predicted $20,000 Bitcoin High Says Market Has Hit Its “Bottom” →

The post Trader Who Predicted $20,000 Bitcoin High Says Market Has Hit Its “Bottom” appeared first on Toshi Times.

item.title: Bitcoin SV Continues Falling As Lawyer Reveals Craig Wright Has No Private Keys
item.dc:creator: Rasmus Pihl
item.description:
Bitcoin SV has been in the news for the past week after an impressive rally. Now, however, the crypto has fallen by more than 40% since its high this week. Moreover, Craig Wright’s lawyer has now said that Wright does not have access to private Bitcoin keys, contrary to recent rumors. Bitcoin SV has fallen … Continue reading Bitcoin SV Continues Falling As Lawyer Reveals Craig Wright Has No Private Keys →

The post Bitcoin SV Continues Falling As Lawyer Reveals Craig Wright Has No Private Keys appeared first on Toshi Times.

item.title: Bitcoin Recently Passed $9,000 As Analysts Say This Rally Will Be “Different”
item.dc:creator: Rasmus Pihl
item.description:
The price of Bitcoin has been steadily on the uptick for the past few days. Although it has been circling around the $8,700 line for a long time, that trend now appears to be broken. Instead, Bitcoin shot up past the $9,000 line and this has analysts excited. Bitcoin briefly passes $9,000 Earlier today, January … Continue reading Bitcoin Recently Passed $9,000 As Analysts Say This Rally Will Be “Different” →

The post Bitcoin Recently Passed $9,000 As Analysts Say This Rally Will Be “Different” appeared first on Toshi Times.

item.title: Bitcoin Hovers Around $8,700 As Poll Suggests $20,000 Bitcoin Price
item.dc:creator: Rasmus Pihl
item.description:
The cryptocurrency market is trading mostly sideways today, after some gains earlier in the week. At the moment of writing, the price of Bitcoin is trading at $8,697. However, although the price of Bitcoin is hovering around $8,700, a fresh poll suggests it may have a massive upside.
